title.narrative: BR Sao Paulo Trains and Signalling

description.narrative: The proposed development objective is to: a) improve the level-of-service provided to the urban rail transport users in the São Paulo Metropolitan Region in a safe and cost-efficient manner by increasing the peak-hour and off-peak carrying capacity of Lines A and F of the Companhia Paulista de Trens Metropolitanos(CPTM) and Lines 1, 2 and 3 of the São Paulo Metro Company (Metro); and b) continuethe strengthening of the transport management and policy framework in the SPMR.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Secretaria dos Transportes Metropolitanos do Estado de Sao Paulo

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Article III, 3.01 | Description :(i)carry out Part B.1 of the Project through STMSP; and(ii)cause Parts A.1 and B.2 of the Project to be carried out by CPTM, and Parts A.2 and B.3 of the Project to be carried out by SPMETRO | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section D.1 | Description :Environmental and Social Provisions 1, 2 & 3 | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain, at all times during theexecution and until completion of the Project, a unit within STM to be responsible for the overall coordination of the Project (the#PCU#). | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II.A | Description :Progress report | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section II.B | Description :Financial Management, Financial Reports and Audits 1, 2& 3 | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section V | Description :Preserve the CDTI and BUI at all times during execution anduntil the completion of the Project | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section IV | Description :STM, Metro and CPTM shall complete the studies referredto in Part B of Schedule 1 to the Loan Agreement within 48 months after effectiveness | Due Date :28-Jul-2012

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement-CPTM, Schedule, Section I.A | Description :CPTM shall maintain, at all times during theexecution and until completion of the Project, a unit responsible for the overall coordination of the implementation of the Project(the #PMU#). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement-Metro, Schedule, Section I.A | Description :METRO shall maintain, at all times during theexecution and until completion of the Project, a unit responsible for the overall coordination of the implementation of the Project(the #PMU#). | Frequency :Yearly
